name: BattleCON: Online Season 1
detailed_description:
BattleCON: Online Season 1 DLC.
Get all 12 Fighters in Season 1 of the game! A great place to start your fighter collection!

Season 1 Includes - Alexian, Cadenza, Eligor, Hikaru, Kallistar, Karin, Khadath, Luc, Riflam, Rukyuk, Seven, Shekhtur.


* No discount or refund is given for fighters you have purchased individually in-game from this series.
about_the_game:
BattleCON: Online Season 1 DLC.
Get all 12 Fighters in Season 1 of the game! A great place to start your fighter collection!

Season 1 Includes - Alexian, Cadenza, Eligor, Hikaru, Kallistar, Karin, Khadath, Luc, Riflam, Rukyuk, Seven, Shekhtur.

short_description: BattleCON: Online Season 1 DLC - 12 Fighter pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics (Cherry Trail)
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This will require to run the client in 30 FPS instead of 60 FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4ghz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of VRAM Dedicated GPU.
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Should run 60 FPS mode fine.

  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

  • Additional Notes: This will require to run the client in 30 FPS instead of 60 FPS.
